description: Try our easy to follow Fish Ball Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,Broccoli,Tree nut free,Egg free,Dairy free
name: Fish Ball Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g skinless firm white fish fillets, (such as saddletail snapper) (coarsely chopped)
450g mixed frozen beans, broccoli and sugarsnap peas (broccoli and sugarsnap peas)

recipeInstructions.text: Process fish in a food processor until finely chopped. Add 2 tbs curry paste and half the onion. Season and pulse until just combined. Roll tablespoons of mixture into balls and set aside.
Heat a large, non-stick saucepan over medium heat. Add remaining curry paste and half the remaining onion. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Add vegetables, stock and 2 cups water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 4 minutes, or until fish balls are almost cooked through.

Add noodles and simmer for a further 1 minute or until noodles are tender and fish balls are cooked through. Serve soup sprinkled with remaining onion and chilli, and drizzled with sesame oil, if using, to taste.
